zh-cn: 尼古拉斯·马杜罗·莫罗斯

description.zh-cn: 委内瑞拉左翼政治人物，现任委内瑞拉总统。曾担任外交部长、副总统，是乌戈·查韦斯指定的接班人。
description.en: A Venezuelan left-wing politician and the current President of Venezuela. He previously served as Minister of Foreign Affairs and Vice President, and was the designated successor of Hugo Chávez.

description.zh-cn: 委内瑞拉前总统，尼古拉斯·马杜罗的前任和政治导师。
description.en: Former President of Venezuela, predecessor and political mentor to Nicolás Maduro.

description.zh-cn: 南美洲国家。
description.en: A country in South America.

nodes.id: 委内瑞拉统一社会主义党

zh-cn: 委内瑞拉统一社会主义党

description.zh-cn: 委内瑞拉的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of Venezuela.

description.zh-cn: 委内瑞拉前执政党，于2007年并入委内瑞拉统一社会主义党。
description.en: A former ruling political party in Venezuela, which merged into the United Socialist Party of Venezuela in 2007.

description.zh-cn: 委内瑞拉政治人物，尼古拉斯·马杜罗的妻子。
description.en: Venezuelan politician and the wife of Nicolás Maduro.

description.zh-cn: 委内瑞拉的首都。
description.en: The capital city of Venezuela.

description.zh-cn: 委内瑞拉的一次总统选举，尼古拉斯·马杜罗以微弱优势获胜。
description.en: A presidential election in Venezuela where Nicolás Maduro won by a narrow margin.

description.zh-cn: 委内瑞拉的一次总统选举，尼古拉斯·马杜罗获胜并连任，但选举结果引发了广泛争议。
description.en: A presidential election in Venezuela where Nicolás Maduro won and was re-elected, but the results sparked widespread controversy.

description.zh-cn: 委内瑞拉的一次总统选举，尼古拉斯·马杜罗被选举委员会宣布获胜，但结果受到反对派和国际社会的广泛质疑。
description.en: A presidential election in Venezuela where Nicolás Maduro was declared the winner by the electoral council, but the results were widely disputed by the opposition and the international community.

description.zh-cn: 在2024年总统选举后，因选举结果争议而在委内瑞拉国内引发的抗议及示威游行。
description.en: Protests and demonstrations that erupted in Venezuela following the 2024 presidential election due to disputed results.

description.zh-cn: 委内瑞拉政治人物，在2019年至2023年间与尼古拉斯·马杜罗争夺总统职位。
description.en: Venezuelan politician who contested the presidency with Nicolás Maduro between 2019 and 2023.

description.zh-cn: 委内瑞拉政治人物，在2013年总统选举中作为反对派候选人与马杜罗竞争。
description.en: Venezuelan politician who competed against Maduro as the opposition candidate in the 2013 presidential election.

nodes.id: 埃德蒙多·冈萨雷斯·乌鲁蒂亚

zh-cn: 埃德蒙多·冈萨雷斯·乌鲁蒂亚

description.zh-cn: 委内瑞拉政治人物，在2024年总统选举中作为反对派候选人与马杜罗竞争。
description.en: Venezuelan politician who competed against Maduro as the opposition candidate in the 2024 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 前美国国务卿。
description.en: Former United States Secretary of State.

description.zh-cn: 北美洲国家，对马杜罗政府实施了多项制裁。
description.en: A country in North America that has imposed numerous sanctions on the Maduro government.

description.zh-cn: 2014年在委内瑞拉爆发的要求总统马杜罗下台的示威活动。
description.en: Protests in Venezuela in 2014 demanding the resignation of President Maduro.

description.zh-cn: 美国第45任总统。
description.en: The 45th President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 一个由多个美洲国家组成的多边机构，旨在解决委内瑞拉的危机。
description.en: A multilateral body of several American countries aimed at addressing the crisis in Venezuela.

description.zh-cn: 由欧洲多个国家组成的政治和经济联盟。
description.en: A political and economic union of several European countries.

description.zh-cn: 亚洲国家，对马杜罗政府表示支持。
description.en: A country in Asia that has expressed support for the Maduro government.

description.zh-cn: 欧亚大陆国家，对马杜罗政府表示支持。
description.en: A transcontinental country that has expressed support for the Maduro government.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯总统。
description.en: President of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 哥伦比亚前总统。
description.en: Former President of Colombia.

description.zh-cn: 南美洲国家。
description.en: A country in South America.

description.zh-cn: 南美洲国家。
description.en: A country in South America.

description.zh-cn: 阿根廷的最高司法机构。
description.en: The highest judicial body in Argentina.

description.zh-cn: 委内瑞拉政治人物，曾担任内政部长，被阿根廷最高法院通缉。
description.en: Venezuelan politician, former Minister of the Interior, wanted by the Argentine Supreme Court.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央总书记兼中国国家主席。
description.en: General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee and President of China.

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府的司法部门。
description.en: The judicial department of the U.S. federal government.

description.zh-cn: 土耳其厨师和餐厅老板，因其独特的撒盐姿势而闻名。
description.en: Turkish chef and restaurateur known for his unique salt-sprinkling gesture.

nodes.id: 委内瑞拉总统与议长地位危机

zh-cn: 委内瑞拉总统与议长地位危机

description.zh-cn: 一场关于谁是委内瑞拉合法总统的政治危机，主要在尼古拉斯·马杜罗和胡安·瓜伊多之间展开。
description.en: A political crisis regarding who is the legitimate president of Venezuela, primarily between Nicolás Maduro and Juan Guaidó.

relationships.target: 委内瑞拉统一社会主义党

description.zh-cn: 乌戈·查韦斯宣布其副总统马杜罗为他的接班人。
description.en: Hugo Chávez announced his Vice President Maduro as his successor.

description.zh-cn: 尼古拉斯·马杜罗在2013年委内瑞拉总统选举中获胜，当选总统。
description.en: Nicolás Maduro won the 2013 Venezuelan presidential election and was elected president.

description.zh-cn: 尼古拉斯·马杜罗在2018年委内瑞拉总统选举中获胜，成功连任总统。
description.en: Nicolás Maduro won the 2018 Venezuelan presidential election and was re-elected president.

description.zh-cn: 委内瑞拉全国选举委员会宣布尼古拉斯·马杜罗赢得第三次总统选举。
description.en: The National Electoral Council of Venezuela announced that Nicolás Maduro won the third presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 在委内瑞拉总统地位危机中与马杜罗争夺总统职位。
description.en: Contested the presidency with Maduro during the Venezuelan presidential crisis.

description.zh-cn: 在2013年总统选举中作为反对派候选人与马杜罗竞争并落败。
description.en: Competed against Maduro as the opposition candidate in the 2013 presidential election and was defeated.

relationships.source: 埃德蒙多·冈萨雷斯·乌鲁蒂亚

description.zh-cn: 在2024年总统选举中作为反对派候选人与马杜罗竞争，选举结果存在争议。
description.en: Competed against Maduro as the opposition candidate in the 2024 presidential election, the results of which are disputed.

description.zh-cn: 示威活动要求马杜罗下台。
description.en: The protests demanded Maduro's resignation.

description.zh-cn: 抗议者质疑2024年总统选举结果并反对马杜罗宣称的胜利。
description.en: Protesters disputed the results of the 2024 presidential election and opposed Maduro's declared victory.

description.zh-cn: 对马杜罗及其政府实施了一系列经济和金融制裁。
description.en: Imposed a series of economic and financial sanctions on Maduro and his government.

description.zh-cn: 签署行政令对委内瑞拉黄金出口实施制裁，旨在打击马杜罗政府。
description.en: Signed an executive order to impose sanctions on Venezuela's gold exports, aiming to target the Maduro government.

description.zh-cn: 以“毒品恐怖主义阴谋”等罪名起诉马杜罗。
description.en: Indicted Maduro on charges including 'narco-terrorism conspiracy'.

description.zh-cn: 质疑马杜罗第二个总统任期的合法性。
description.en: Questioned the legitimacy of Maduro's second presidential term.

description.zh-cn: 拒绝认可马杜罗连任选举结果。
description.en: Refused to recognize the results of Maduro's re-election.

description.zh-cn: 对马杜罗政府表示信任和支持，并祝贺其多次当选。
description.en: Expressed trust and support for the Maduro government and congratulated him on his multiple elections.

description.zh-cn: 致电祝贺马杜罗当选连任委内瑞拉总统。
description.en: Sent a congratulatory message to Maduro on his re-election as President of Venezuela.

description.zh-cn: 祝贺马杜罗当选，并发展两国战略伙伴关系。
description.en: Congratulated Maduro on his election and developed a strategic partnership between the two countries.

description.zh-cn: 电贺马杜罗再次当选委内瑞拉总统。
description.en: Sent a congratulatory telegram to Maduro on his re-election as President of Venezuela.

description.zh-cn: 马杜罗指控桑托斯是针对他的无人机刺杀行动的幕后主使。
description.en: Maduro accused Santos of being the mastermind behind the drone assassination attempt against him.

description.zh-cn: 因不承认马杜罗的第二个任期而与委内瑞拉断交。
description.en: Severed diplomatic relations with Venezuela for not recognizing Maduro's second term.

description.zh-cn: 马杜罗宣布与哥伦比亚断交。
description.en: Maduro announced the severance of diplomatic relations with Colombia.

description.zh-cn: 马杜罗宣布与美国断交。
description.en: Maduro announced the severance of diplomatic relations with the United States.

description.zh-cn: 以涉嫌反人类罪为由向尼古拉斯·马杜罗发出逮捕令。
description.en: Issued an arrest warrant for Nicolás Maduro on suspicion of crimes against humanity.

description.zh-cn: 以涉嫌反人类罪为由向迪奥斯达多·卡韦略发出逮捕令。
description.en: Issued an arrest warrant for Diosdado Cabello on suspicion of crimes against humanity.

description.zh-cn: 马杜罗在伊斯坦堡的Nusr-Et餐厅与撒盐哥会面并合影。
description.en: Maduro met and was photographed with Salt Bae at the Nusr-Et restaurant in Istanbul.
